text: México Pelágico is a 2014 Mexican documentary film. It was written by Jerónimo Prieto, who also directed it. It portrays the life of the open ocean of Mexico through the eyes of young conservationists. It received the Director's Award at the 12th San Francisco International Ocean Film Festival in early 2015, and an audience award for "Best Environmental Film" at the 2015 Vail Film Festival. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Mexican documentary films Category:Mexican films Category:Documentary films about water and the environment Category:2014 films Category:English-language films Category:Spanish-language films
title: México Pelágico
